title: Ovid Fasti 4 - how they feel about the work

content.prompt: From the words <u>et non sentitur sedulitate labor</u> (line 10), we learn that

choices.label: they are too busy to feel fatigue
they do not pay attention to their work
she does not feel anxious about the work

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
